bibl.title: The Roman Empire's Southeastern-most Frontier: Recent Discoveries at Berenike and Environs (Eastern Desert of Egypt) 1998-2000.
Limes XVIII. Proceedings of the XVIIIth International Congress of Roman Frontier Studies Held in Amman, Jordan (September 2000)
bibl.author: SIDEBOTHAM, Steven E.

bibl.note: Survey of recent discoveries in Berenike and its territory (including Greek inscriptions).
SIDEBOTHAM Steven E., The Roman Empire's Southeastern-most Frontier: Recent Discoveries at Berenike and Environs (Eastern Desert of Egypt) 1998-2000.

Philip FREEMAN, Julian BENNETT, Zbigniew T. FIEMA and Birgitta HOFFMANN (Edd.), Limes XVIII. Proceedings of the XVIIIth International Congress of Roman Frontier Studies Held in Amman, Jordan (September 2000) = BAR. International Series. 1084 (Oxford, 2002) Volume I, pp. 361-378.
